item.description:
Ok its been awhile, our dancing shoes are screaming at us, and we miss the great sound of Dont Call Me Shirley, so...............

 

Come on out to The Sports Depot at RockPond in Georgetown to have some dinner and dance to the great sound of DCMS.

 

We will meet at 7:00pm, have some cocktails, dinner and conversation. At 9:00pm DCMS will begin to play. From what I understand they pack the house when they are at the Sports Depot.

If you would like to join us after dinner please include this in your RSVP.

Please remember to bring the meetup cellphone number (978-304-2811) so if you can't find us, get lost or are running late.

 

Hope to see y'all at the Depot.

Donna & Janet
item.name: Dinner & Don't Call Me Shirley
